name: Invertetris
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #49, this was my first entry ever.

With the theme being "Unstable", I figured to take a spin on Tetris but instead of needing to align the shapes to make them dissappear, you need to build up to a number of goals in order to complete the level.

INFO: still in very early production stage.
Will continue working on this over time.
